docs.lead_paragraph: Fitness activity trackers have come a long way since Leonardo da Vinci sketched a rudimentary gear-and-pendulum pedometer to track the treks of 15th century Roman soldiers.

headline.main: Activity Trackers Get Smarter at Measuring Fitness
headline.print_headline: Activity Trackers Get Smarter at Measuring Fitness

docs.snippet: Fitness activity trackers have come a long way since Leonardo da Vinci sketched a rudimentary gear-and-pendulum pedometer to track the treks of 15th century Roman soldiers.
